languages.text: In combat, familiar gets +1 deflection for each tile between it and Overseer, but no more than {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: In combat, familiar gets +1 deflection for each tile between it and Overseer, but no more than {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: 戦闘中、ファミリアーは自分と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の間のセルごとに {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} に +1 を得る（最大で {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} まで）。
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、ファミリアーは自分と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の間のセルごとに {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g} に +1 を得る（最大で {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus} まで）。

languages.text: Au combat, le familier gagne un bonus de +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} pour chaque case le séparant du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, jusqu'à un maximum de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Au combat, le familier gagne un bonus de +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} pour chaque case le séparant du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, jusqu'à un maximum de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: En combate, el familiar gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada casilla que lo separa del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, hasta un máximo de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: En combate, el familiar gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} por cada casilla que lo separa del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, hasta un máximo de {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

languages.text: 战斗期间，使仆与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}之间每有1格距离，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点，最多提高{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点。
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: 战斗期间，使仆与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}之间每有1格距离，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点，最多提高{unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}点。

languages.text: Im Kampf erhält der Vertraute +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} für jedes Feld zwischen ihm und dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} (max. {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}).
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: Im Kampf erhält der Vertraute +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} für jedes Feld zwischen ihm und dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} (max. {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}).

languages.text: İye, çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ile aralarındaki her hücre için +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri (maksimum {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}) kazanır.
languages.original_text: In combat, the familiar gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} for each cell between it and the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}, up to maximum of {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.

traits.locale_text: İye, çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} ile aralarındaki her hücre için +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri (maksimum {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}) kazanır.

languages.text: В бою фамильяр получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} за каждую клетку расстояния между ним и {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателем{/g} вплоть до максимума, равного {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}.
